snippet: California issued its first cease-and-desist order under this year’s tightened drought regulations, telling an irrigation district on Thursday to stop pumping water.
abstract: California warns West Side Irrigation District in Tracy to stop pumping water, threatening fines of up to $10,000 a day; farmers were told to stop irrigating fields as state struggles through its fourth year of drought.
lead_paragraph: California issued its first cease-and-desist order under this year’s tightened drought regulations, telling an irrigation district on Thursday to stop pumping water.

headline.main: California: Water District Told to Stop Pumping
headline.print_headline: California: Water District Told to Stop Pumping
